tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (NP (NP (NP (NN Training)) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT the) (NN pitch)))) (NP (JJ black) (CC and) (JJ freezing) (NN cold))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [Training/NN nmod:in>[pitch/NN case>in/IN det>the/DT] dep>[cold/NN amod>[black/JJ cc>and/CC conj:and>freezing/JJ] amod>freezing/JJ]]
